verses.verse: <S%H310>After<s%> <S%H40>Abimelech<s%> there <S%H6965>arose<s%> to <S%H3467>save<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H8439>Tola<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6312>Puah,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1734>Dodo,<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H3485>Issachar;<s%> and he <S%H3427>lived<s%> in <S%H8069>Shamir<s%> in the <S%H2022>hill<s%> country of <S%H669>Ephraim.<s%>

He had <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> who <S%H7392>rode<s%> on <S%H7970>thirty<s%> donkey <S%H5895>colts,<s%> and they had <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H5892>cities,<s%> which are <S%H7121>called<s%> Havvoth <S%H2334>Jair<s%> to this <S%H3117>day,<s%> which are in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead.<s%>

The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3254>again<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> that which was <S%H7451>evil<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and <S%H5647>served<s%> the <S%H1168>Baals,<s%> and the <S%H6252>Ashtaroth,<s%> and the <S%H430>gods<s%> of <S%H758>Syria,<s%> and the <S%H430>gods<s%> of <S%H6721>Sidon,<s%> and the <S%H430>gods<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab,<s%> and the <S%H430>gods<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon,<s%> and the <S%H430>gods<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines;<s%> and they <S%H5800>forsook<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and <S%H5647>didn't<s%> serve him.

The <S%H639>anger<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> was <S%H2734>kindled<s%> against <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and he <S%H4376>sold<s%> them into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines,<s%> and into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon.<s%>

They <S%H7492>troubled<s%> and <S%H7533>oppressed<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> that <S%H8083>year.<s%> For eighteen <S%H8141>years,<s%> they <S%H7533>oppressed<s%> all the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> that were <S%H5676>beyond<s%> the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites,<s%> which is in <S%H1568>Gilead.<s%>

The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon<s%> passed <S%H5674>over<s%> the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> to <S%H3898>fight<s%> also against <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and against <S%H1144>Benjamin,<s%> and against the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim;<s%> so that <S%H3478>Israel<s%> was <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H3334>distressed.<s%>

The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H2199>cried<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "We have <S%H2398>sinned<s%> against <S%H5800>you,<s%> even because we have forsaken our <S%H430>God,<s%> and have <S%H5647>served<s%> the <S%H1168>Baals.<s%>"

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H4714>"Didn't<s%> I save you from the Egyptians, and from the <S%H567>Amorites,<s%> from the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon,<s%> and from the <S%H6430>Philistines?<s%>

The <S%H6722>Sidonians<s%> <S%H6002>also,<s%> and the Amalekites, and the <S%H4584>Maonites,<s%> <S%H3905>oppressed<s%> <S%H6817>you;<s%> and you cried to <S%H3467>me,<s%> and I saved you out of their <S%H3027>hand.<s%>
Yet you have <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> <S%H5647>me,<s%> and served <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods:<s%> therefore I will <S%H3467>save<s%> you no <S%H3254>more.<s%>
<S%H3212>Go<s%> and <S%H2199>cry<s%> to the <S%H430>gods<s%> which you have <S%H977>chosen.<s%> Let <S%H1992>them<s%> <S%H3467>save<s%> you in the <S%H6256>time<s%> of your <S%H6869>distress!<s%>"

The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> "We have <S%H2398>sinned:<s%> <S%H6213>do<s%> you to us whatever <S%H5869>seems<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%> to <S%H5337>you;<s%> only deliver <S%H3117>us,<s%> please, this day."

They put <S%H5493>away<s%> the <S%H5236>foreign<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%> from <S%H7130>among<s%> <S%H5647>them,<s%> and served <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%> and his <S%H5315>soul<s%> was <S%H7114>grieved<s%> for the <S%H5999>misery<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

Then the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon<s%> were gathered <S%H6817>together,<s%> and <S%H2583>encamped<s%> in <S%H1568>Gilead.<s%> The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> assembled themselves <S%H622>together,<s%> and <S%H2583>encamped<s%> in <S%H4709>Mizpah.<s%>

The <S%H5971>people,<s%> the <S%H8269>princes<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead,<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> to <S%H7453>another,<s%> "What <S%H376>man<s%> is he who will <S%H2490>begin<s%> to <S%H3898>fight<s%> against the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon?<s%> He shall be <S%H7218>head<s%> over all the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead.<s%>"
